price: 39. (Il en fut ainsi de) de Qârûn (Coré), Pharaon et Hâmân. Moïse leur apporta les preuves évidentes mais ils furent hautains et dédaigneux sur terre. Mais ils ne purent (Nous) distancer.
arabic: وَقَٰرُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqārūna wafir'ʿawna wahāmāna walaqad jāahum mūsā bil-bayināti fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi wamā kānū sābiqīna
